page.title: 08Wallington Station
page.content:
Wallington Station was rebuilt in 1983, and is now a tall black building. Before that there was a house built on top and there was a long row of houses alongside. The longest train that goes through Wallington is an 8 carriage one. There are 2 people needed to oper- ate each train;a driver and a guard. The first train starts at 5:45am and the last train comes in at 12:08pm. 8 people work at Wallington Station in the ticket office, on barriers and in general station maintenance. 5000 people travel on trains from Wallington each day. New trains have been intro- duced. They are cleaner and lighter and doors are operated by people inside the train.
By Holy Trinity School
